title: Ripple Acquires Crypto-Focused Chartered Trust Company Fortress Trust
description: A person with knowledge of the matter said the figure was less than the $250 million price tag for custody firm Metaco, which Ripple acquired in May.

title: FBI questions Winklevoss twins on DCG’s CEO misconduct
description: US federal officials are currently scrutinizing the internal financial transactions of DCG and its subsidiary, Genesis Global Capital.

title: Farewell, USD: Bitcoin Joins 21 Nations, BRICS, and ASEAN in Abandoning the U.S. Dollar
